uvi.description:
scsi: pm80xx: Fix memory leak during rmmod

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.5 by commit 269a4311b15f68d24e816f43f123888f241ed13d. For more details please see the references link.
